content: in the center using the tail with color a draw up a loop and put it on to the of color b threaded on to a tapestry needle catching needle pulling color a snug insert hook in second single_crochet each of the cast on bumps in color b with the needle made draw up a loop and put it on to the needle pull tight weave in ends pulling yarn snug continue to draw up a loop for every single_crochet 36 loops this will be a tight round but move mooseknits blogspot com
